Issue.creator: jyellick
Issue.summary: Create a validation info routing shim and wire it.
Issue.description: Per FAB-13523 and FAB-13524 the validation parameters obtained by the validation code should be injected as a dependency. This story is to create a small routing shim which first checks the new lifecycle implementation to determine if there are validation parameters defined there, then, if none exists, falls back to the legacy LSCC implementation.
